price: Ɔkaa sε ”Mehunuu deε wͻn nhunuiε, enti me saa (mfuturo) me nsa mma frii ͻbͻfoͻ no anamͻn so, εna meto guu (ogya no a Farao nkorͻfoͻ no agudeε no wͻ mu no mu), na deε m'adwen kyerεε me ne no “.
arabic: قَالَ بَصُرۡتُ بِمَا لَمۡ يَبۡصُرُواْ بِهِۦ فَقَبَضۡتُ قَبۡضَةٗ مِّنۡ أَثَرِ ٱلرَّسُولِ فَنَبَذۡتُهَا وَكَذَٰلِكَ سَوَّلَتۡ لِي نَفۡسِي

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla baṣur'tu bimā lam yabṣurū bihi faqabaḍtu qabḍatan min athari al-rasūli fanabadhtuhā wakadhālika sawwalat lī nafsī
